ORIGAM Documentation : Concat Function

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Jan 07, 2019

This function adds 2 or more string expressions together. The result is a string.

Function Parameters

Strings

List of strings elements. They will be concatenated in alphabetical order of the reference names.

Possible children:

  • Data Constants
  • Field references
  • Functions
